show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu! Ora to Uchū no Princess (movie 20)
other_title: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ！ オラと宇宙のプリンセス (Japanese)
plot: The Nohara family is abducted by aliens from an advanced civilization who claim that Himawari is a legendary princess who will save the solar system. Unaware of the consequences, Shinnosuke signs a contract that allows her to be raised in the alien world. This forces him and his parents to go on a desperate quest to bring her back.
ending_theme: "Shounen yo Uso wo Tsuke!" (少年よ 嘘をつけ!) by Watarirouka Hashiri-tai 7
